scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env node -r dotenv/config ../../node_modules/.bin/tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.dev:kill: lsof -ti:4000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process on port 4000'
scripts.build: npm run build -w @aem/shared && npm run build -w @aem/api && npm run build -w @aem/web
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('apps/web/dist', 'apps/api/public', { recursive: true })"
